item.description:
Here's some info for Sunday at Fenway.  The race starts at 8 am.  So the group could meet during the race, check out the photos of the people that will be coming and MEET IN SECTION 18 BOX SEATS- beyond the dugout.  If I don't find the group after the race, meet in the designated "F"  Meeting Spot(first initial of my last name). Before the runners return, there are various events in Fenway during the race.  There will be opportunities to take photos with Wally The Green Monster and the Red Sox 2004 and 2007 World Series Trophies.  Fenways Park's tour guides will be stationed at select points of interest throughout the ballpark to offer facinating information of that area of the ballpark and the history of Fenway.  

I will be wearing the Red and White Baseball dress, so I'll be easy to spot when I cross the finish line.  Depending on when I actually start, I could be crossing the finish line at the GREEN MONSTER around 9:20-9:45.  We then walk to Home Plate for photos. At the conclusion of the race supporters who are inside Fenway Park will be allowed on to the field to walk the Warning Track and take photos and get the opportunity to sit in the dugout. It was a blast the last two years! THIS WILL TAKE PLACE SUBJECT TO THE DISCRETION OF THE RED SOX MANAGEMENT AND WEATHER.

WE WILL HEAD OVER TO GAME ON AT 12 NOON WHERE NATIVE AND GAME ON HOST SONJA HAS RESERVED A SKY BOX SECTION FOR US FOR LUNCH, DRINKS and USE OF THE BATTING CAGES.

The Run to Home Base is a 9K race organized by the Red Sox Foundation
and Massachusetts General Hospital. The funds raised will go toward the
Home Base Program, a philanthropic partnership that is dedicated to
improving the lives of New England servicemen and women returning home
with combat stress disorders through clinical care, innovative research,
education, family support, and community outreach.

This cause means a lot to many of us who know family and friends with men and and women that have willingly signed up to fight overseas.

You can learn more about the race on the website:
OFFICIAL WEBSITE HERE:

http://www.runtohomebase.org

Looking forward to seeing everyone after the race!  Being able to walk to Warning Track is an awesome experience not to be missed!!  E-mail me with questions or post any questions on this site.

Thank you!

Mindy
item.how_to_find_us: Event takes place at discretion of Red Sox and weather. We will not know until day of event. Meet in Section 18 Box Seats while the race is on-going.
item.name: Walk Fenway Warning Track With Mindy & Party after The Run to Home BaseRace
